abstract: CNN on Tuesday said it had acquired Zite, a company that markets an iPad app that learns what its users want to read and view.
snippet: CNN on Tuesday said it had acquired Zite, a company that markets an iPad app that learns what its users want to read and view.
lead_paragraph: Putting an emphasis on personalization tools for the Web, CNN on Tuesday said it had acquired Zite, a company that markets an iPad app that learns what its users want to read and view.

headline.main: CNN Acquires Zite, an iPad App Company
